content: Is there any documentation for all the tactics that can be used in Lean 4?
what tactics you can use depend on your imports, since projects can define their own tactics. if your prospective project includes mathlib, you can try #help tactic
that should give a list with tactics and their docstrings
This webpage lists all the tactics for mathlib4: https://seasawher.github.io/mathlib4-help/tactics/
@Edward van de Meent and @hilbert Thanks. I also realized just now that I could search for Mathlib.Tactic.<name> and Lean.Parser.Tactic.<name> in the mathlib4 documentation page
Soham Saha has marked this topic as resolved.
